tier.item: b. ta du-wan xiao-shuo le. (verb + resultative)
`She has read the novel for a day.'
c. ta du le yi-tian xiaoshuo. (verb + time quantifier)
`She has read the novel for a day.'
c. ta du le yi-tian xiaoshuo.
She has read the novel for a day.
